name: Multiplayer Gun Game
description:
This is a small game I made to play with friends. It´s local multiplayer, has 5 skins and 9 guns to choose from.  You just shoot at each other until you die. Bullets and med packs fall from the sky. Some guns can break boxes, but in general you´re safe behind a box. I plan on adding maps, power ups and consumables later on. It has to be played with 3 players (sorry haven´t implemented 2 player game yet, you can just leave one player to the side).

Menu controls:

Click a character to choose it and press Space to lock it, same with weapons

After all three players and guns have been chosen the game starts

You can come back to menu by pressing Escape during the game

Game controls:

Player 1: WASD (S to shoot)

Player 2: UHJK (J to shoot)

Player 3: Arrows (Down arrow to shoot)

R: respawn everyone
